description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A new Top-Down racing game is coming! Race over 26 circuits with different game modes: - Pratice  - Quick Race  - Complete Weekend Race  - Season  Race against to 19 CPU drivers or jump into the XBOX Live! experience and race against other human players. The internal editor lets you a complete personalization of drivers and teams!
description.short: A new Top-Down racing game is coming! Race over 26 circuits with different game modes: - Pratice  - Quick Race  - Complete Weekend Race  - Season  Race against to 19 CPU drivers or jump into the XBOX Live! experience and race against other human players. The internal editor lets you a complete personalization of drivers and teams!
